name: RestrictiveLungDiseaseSMCT
title: Restrictive lung disease SM CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses most commonly used for patients with restrictive lung disease.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have an active  diagnosis of restrictive lung disease. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Diagnosis category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes representing an active diagnosis of a restrictive lung disease using the SNOMED CT code system.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)

concept.display: Restrictive lung disease due to amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (disorder)

Restrictive lung mechanics due to neuromuscular disease (disorder)
Restrictive lung disease due to muscular dystrophy (disorder)
Restrictive lung disease due to kyphoscoliosis (disorder)
